mapper.update:
update user_diary
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circle_id = #{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
theme_id = #{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diary_createtime = #{diaryCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diary_updatetime = #{diaryUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diary_content = #{diaryContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
diary_like = #{diaryLike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diary_browse = #{diaryBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diary_status = #{diaryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

diary_image = #{diaryImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
diary_address = #{diaryAddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
diary_voice = #{diaryVoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diary_video = #{diaryVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_diary set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circle_id = #{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, theme_id = #{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diary_createtime = #{diaryCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diary_updatetime = #{diaryUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diary_content = #{diaryContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, diary_like = #{diaryLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diary_browse = #{diaryBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diary_status = #{diaryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diary_comment = #{diaryComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diary_deltime = #{diaryDeltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diary_image = #{diaryImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, diary_address = #{diaryAddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, diary_voice = #{diaryVoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diary_video = #{diaryVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_diary set diary_image =
concat(diary_image, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
concat_ws(",",diary_image, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from user_diary where circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and diary_status != 2
and diary_status != #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from user_diary where circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (diary_status = 0 or diary_status = 1)

select
from user_diary where circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and diary_status != 2 order by circle_id,diary_createtime desc limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from user_diary where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and diary_createtime like concat(#{likeDiaryCreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and diary_status!=#{diaryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from user_diary where datediff(diary_createtime, now()) = 0 and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from user_diary where datediff(diary_createtime, now()) = 0 and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and theme_id=#{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from user_diary where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and circle_id=#{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and diary_createtime like concat(#{likeDiaryCreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select count(distinct user_id) from user_diary where circle_id = #{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and date_format(diary_createtime, '%Y%m%d') = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (diary_status = 0 or diary_status = 1)

select user_id from user_diary where circle_id = #{circleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and date_format(diary_createtime,'%Y%m%d') = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (diary_status = 0 or diary_status = 1) group by user_id
select count(1) from user_diary where theme_id=#{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (diary_status=0 or diary_status=1)
